member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.DataPurgeTaskOptionsValidator
member.summary: Represents options validation for data purge task registration.

member.name: T:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.DataPurgeTaskOptionsValidatorOptions
member.summary: Represents options used to configure data purge tasks.

member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.DataPurgeTaskOptionsValidatorOptions.#ctor(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The configuration to read the options from.

member.name: M:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.DataPurgeTaskOptionsValidatorOptions.#ctor(System.Int32,System.Int32,System.String[],System.String[])
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.
member.param: The minimum number of days the contact hasn't been interacted with the brand that can be specified for contacts data purge.
The minimum number of days should be passed after interaction started and interaction can be purged.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.DataPurgeTaskOptionsValidatorOptions.MinimumContactCutoffDays
member.summary: Gets the minimum number of days the contact hasn't been interacted with the brand that can be specified for contacts data purge.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.DataPurgeTaskOptionsValidatorOptions.MinimumInteractionStartedDaysCutoff
member.summary: The minimum number of days should be passed after interaction started and interaction can be purged.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.DataPurgeTaskOptionsValidatorOptions.AllowedContactConditionIds
member.summary: Gets the IDs of the contact conditions that are allowed to be passed to a data purge task.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.DataPurgeTaskOptionsValidatorOptions.AllowedInteractionConditionIds
member.summary: Gets the IDs of the interaction conditions that are allowed to be passed to a data purge task.

member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.CantAccessFolderMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot access the destination folder specified in the profile '{0}'. Access denied..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.DirectoryNotFoundMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The destination folder specified in the profile '{0}' is not found..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.InvalidContactConditionsMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register delete contacts task. The following conditions are not found: {0}.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.InvalidCutoffDaysForExportMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register export contacts task. Cutoff date time should be positive. Actual value is {1} days..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.InvalidCutoffDaysMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register delete contacts task. Cutoff date time should not be less than {0} days. Actual value is {1} days..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.InvalidInteractionChannelsMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register delete interactions task. The following channel IDs specified in both options - channels to delete and channels to skip: {0}..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.InvalidInteractionConditionsMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register delete interactions task. The following conditions are not found: {0}.

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.InvalidInteractionEventsMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register delete interactions task. The following event IDs specified in both options - events to delete and events to skip: {0}..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.InvalidInteractionStartedDaysCutoff
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register delete interactions task. Interaction started date time should not be less than {0} days. Actual value is {1} days..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.InvalidStartedDaysCutoffForExportMessageFormat
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Cannot register export interactions task. Interaction started date time should be positive. Actual value is {1} days..

member.name: P:Sitecore.XConnect.DataTools.Tasks.Options.Validation.Resources.ProfileNameIsNotSet
member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to The profile name is not set.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Unexpected error during test file upload. .
